name: Rally
blurb: Plan your next trip with Rally!
description: Plan a trip for yourself or with friends. Create multiple trips, itineraries, split costs, and find popular activites near your travel destination.

name: Circle
blurb: Circle is an online community bulletin
description: Want to host a community event? Need volunteers or donations for the neighborhood community center? Circle provides a place to enrich and provide further betterment of your community, and get to know your neighbors better!

name: Vaccine Finder
blurb: Find a Covid-19 vaccine administrator near you
description: Use Vaccine Finder to find the nearest Covid-19 vaccine administrator near you. Find which vaccines are available and book an appointment for your first or second dose of the Covid-19 vaccine.
